name: 3dicons - Open source 3D icon library
description:
3dicons is a set of beautifully crafted open-source 3D icons created in Blender and made available to the public for free. It has been released under a Creative Commons CC0 license, and hence it is free to use for personal and commercial projects, as well as copying, editing, remixing, sharing, and redrawing. I hope this resource will make it easier for designers and content creators to produce beautiful and effective designs in less time. 


Now you use 3dicons Figma Plugin


This file is contains 

  • 1440+ Rendered PNG files that contain -
  • 120+ icons
  • 4 colors style (including clay white)
  • 3 camera angles
  • 1000 x 1000 px image


You can grab source file and high quality render from 3dicons.co
